articles.author: Joshua Kloke
articles.title: How the Maple Leafs won Game 5 and stayed alive: 5 takeaways - The Athletic
articles.description: Matthew Knies scored in overtime to seal a 2-1 win over the Boston Bruins while Joseph Woll stopped 28-of-29 shots to force a Game 6.
articles.content: BOSTON In a tense, must-win game with so many future possibilities within the franchise hanging in the balance, youd expect it would be the Toronto Maple Leafs veterans to step up and take control of… [+8166 chars]
